verses.verse: Now it came to pass in the thirtieth<WH7970> year<WH8141>, in the fourth<WH7243> month<WH2568>, in the fifth day of the month<WH2320>, as I was among<WH8432> the captives<WH1473> by the river<WH5104> Chebar<WH3529>, that the heavens<WH8064> were opened<WH6605>, and I saw<WH7200> visions<WH4759> of God<WH430>.
In the fifth<WH2568> day of the month<WH2320>, which was the fifth<WH2549> year<WH8141> of king<WH4428> Jehoiachin<WH3112>'s captivity<WH1546>,

the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> came expressly unto Ezekiel<WH3168> the priest<WH3548>, the son<WH1121> of Buzi<WH941>, in the land<WH776> of the Chaldeans<WH3778> by the river<WH5104> Chebar<WH3529>; and the hand<WH3027> of Jehovah was there upon him<WH3068>.

And I looked<WH7200>, and<WH7307>, behold, a stormy wind came<WH935> out of the north<WH6828>, a great<WH1419> cloud<WH6051>, with a fire<WH784> infolding<WH3947> itself<WH5051>, and a brightness round about<WH5439> it<WH8432>, and out of the midst thereof as it were glowing<WH5869> metal<WH2830>, out of the midst<WH8432> of the fire<WH784>.
And out of the midst<WH8432> thereof came the likeness<WH1823> of four<WH702> living creatures<WH2416>. And this was their appearance<WH4758>: they<WH2007> had the likeness<WH1823> of a man<WH120>.
And every one<WH259> had four<WH702> faces<WH6440>, and every one<WH259> of them had four<WH702> wings<WH3671>.

And their feet<WH7272> were straight<WH3477> feet<WH7272>; and the sole<WH3709> of their feet<WH7272> was like the sole<WH3709> of a calf<WH5695>'s foot<WH7272>; and they sparkled<WH5340> like<WH5869> burnished<WH7044> brass<WH5178>.
And they had the hands<WH3027> of a man<WH120> under their wings<WH3671> on their four<WH702> sides<WH7253>; and they four<WH702> had their faces<WH6440> and their wings thus<WH3671>:
their wings<WH3671> were joined<WH2266> one<WH802> to another<WH269>; they turned<WH5437> not when they went<WH3212>; they went<WH3212> every one<WH376> straight<WH5676> forward<WH6440>.

As for the likeness<WH1823> of their faces<WH6440>, they had the face<WH6440> of a man<WH120>; and they four<WH702> had the face<WH6440> of a lion<WH738> on the right side<WH3225>; and they four<WH702> had the face<WH6440> of an ox<WH7794> on the left side<WH8040>; they four<WH702> had also the face<WH6440> of an eagle<WH5404>.

And their faces<WH6440> and their wings<WH3671> were separate<WH6504> above<WH4605>; two<WH8147> wings of every one<WH376> were joined<WH2266> one<WH376> to another<WH376>, and two<WH8147> covered<WH3680> their bodies<WH1472>.
And they went<WH3212> every one<WH376> straight<WH5676> forward<WH6440>: whither the spirit<WH7307> was to go<WH3212>, they went<WH3212>; they turned<WH5437> not when they went<WH3212>.

As for the likeness<WH1823> of the living creatures<WH2416>, their appearance<WH4758> was like burning<WH1197> coals<WH1513> of fire<WH784>, like the appearance<WH4758> of torches<WH3940>: the fire went up and down<WH1980> among the living creatures<WH2416>; and the fire<WH784> was bright<WH5051>, and out of the fire<WH784> went forth<WH3318> lightning<WH1300>.
And the living creatures<WH2416> ran<WH7519> and returned<WH7725> as the appearance<WH4758> of a flash of lightning<WH965>.

Now as I beheld<WH7200> the living creatures<WH2416>, behold<WH259>, one wheel<WH212> upon the earth<WH776> beside<WH681> the living creatures<WH2416>, for each of the four<WH702> faces thereof<WH6440>.

The appearance<WH4758> of the wheels<WH212> and their work<WH4639> was like<WH5869> unto a beryl<WH8658>: and they four<WH702> had one<WH259> likeness<WH1823>; and their appearance<WH4758> and their work<WH4639> was as it were a wheel<WH212> within<WH8432> a wheel<WH212>.
When they went<WH3212>, they went<WH3212> in their four<WH702> directions<WH7253>: they turned<WH5437> not when they went<WH3212>.
As for their rims<WH1354>, they were high<WH1363> and dreadful<WH3374>; and they four<WH702> had their rims<WH1354> full<WH4392> of eyes<WH5869> round about<WH5439>.

And when the living creatures<WH2416> went<WH3212>, the wheels<WH212> went<WH3212> beside them<WH681>; and when the living creatures<WH2416> were lifted up<WH5375> from the earth<WH776>, the wheels<WH212> were lifted up<WH5375>.

Whithersoever the spirit<WH7307> was to go<WH3212>, they went<WH3212>; thither was the spirit<WH7307> to go<WH3212>: and the wheels<WH212> were lifted up<WH5375> beside<WH5980> them<WH7307>; for the spirit of the living creature<WH2416> was in the wheels<WH212>.

When those went<WH3212>, these went<WH3212>; and when those stood<WH5975>, these stood<WH5975>; and when those were lifted up<WH5375> from the earth<WH776>, the wheels<WH212> were lifted up<WH5375> beside<WH5980> them<WH7307>: for the spirit of the living creature<WH2416> was in the wheels<WH212>.

And over the head<WH7218> of the living creature<WH2416> there was the likeness<WH1823> of a firmament<WH7549>, like<WH5869> the terrible<WH3372> crystal<WH7140> to look upon<WH5186>, stretched forth over their heads<WH7218> above<WH4605>.

And under the firmament<WH7549> were their wings<WH3671> straight<WH3477>, the one<WH802> toward the other<WH269>: every one<WH376> had two<WH8147> which covered<WH3680> on this side<WH2007>, and every one<WH376> had two<WH8147> which covered<WH3680> on that side<WH2007>, their bodies<WH1472>.

And when they went<WH3212>, I heard<WH8085> the noise<WH6963> of their wings<WH3671> like the noise<WH6963> of great<WH7227> waters<WH4325>, like the voice<WH6963> of the Almighty<WH7706>, a noise<WH6963> of tumult<WH1999> like the noise<WH6963> of a host<WH4264>: when they stood<WH5975>, they let down<WH7503> their wings<WH3671>.
And there was a voice<WH6963> above the firmament<WH7549> that was over their heads<WH7218>: when they stood<WH5975>, they let down<WH7503> their wings<WH3671>.

And above<WH4605> the firmament<WH7549> that was over their heads<WH7218> was the likeness<WH1823> of a throne<WH3678>, as the appearance<WH4758> of a sapphire<WH5601> stone<WH68>; and upon the likeness<WH1823> of the throne<WH3678> was a likeness<WH1823> as the appearance<WH4758> of a man<WH120> upon it above<WH4605>.

And I saw<WH7200> as it were glowing<WH5869> metal<WH2830>, as the appearance<WH4758> of fire<WH784> within<WH1004> it round about<WH5439>, from the appearance<WH4758> of his loins<WH4975> and upward<WH4605>; and from the appearance<WH4758> of his loins<WH4975> and downward<WH4295> I saw<WH7200> as it were the appearance<WH4758> of fire<WH784>, and there was brightness<WH5051> round about him<WH5439>.

As the appearance<WH4758> of the bow<WH7198> that is in the cloud<WH6051> in the day<WH3117> of rain<WH1653>, so was the appearance<WH4758> of the brightness<WH5051> round about<WH5439>. This was the appearance<WH4758> of the likeness<WH1823> of the glory<WH3519> of Jehovah<WH3068>. And when I saw<WH7200> it<WH5307>, I fell upon my face<WH6440>, and I heard<WH8085> a voice<WH6963> of one that spake<WH1696>.
